gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: JASON-1_GDR_SSHA_NETCDF > Jason-1 Geophysical Data Record (GDR) Sea Surface Height Anomaly (SSHA) NetCDF

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Jason-1 Geophysical Data Record (GDR) Sea Surface Height Anomaly (SSHA) NetCDF

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The SSHA are derived from the Jason-1 GDR. The instruments on Jason-1 make direct observations of the following quantities: altimeter range, significant wave height, ocean radar backscatter cross-section (a measure of wind speed), ionospheric electron content (derived by a simple formula), tropospheric water content, and position relative to the GPS satellite constellation.

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: EARTH SCIENCE>OCEANS>SEA SURFACE TOPOGRAPHY>SEA SURFACE HEIGHT>NONE>NONE>NONE
